Articles.Content:
Saw this on the medieval engineers forum. 

Pretty unneeded, newton laws has the benefit of being self enforcing. 

On the other hand they are very strict, they might carry capital punishment even in the most liberal places and gravity discriminates fat people. 

Call your congressman today.
Last time I checked, they punish you severely for jumping off of high places.

> 
> Last time I checked, they punish you severely for jumping off of high places.

Unless you go fast enough...
I didn't think it was for the falling part, I thought it was for the landing. ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

> 
> Unless you go fast enough...

Touche'
